cookiecutter.short_description: This service consumes Anti-Virus tags (`av.virus_name`) and extracts family, behavior, and platform information based on [AVClass2](https://github.com/malicialab/avclass/tree/master/avclass2).
cookiecutter.short_description_fr: Ce service consomme des balises antivirus (`av.virus_name`) et extrait des informations sur la famille, le comportement et la plate-forme en se basant sur [AVClass2](https://github.com/malicialab/avclass/tree/master/avclass2).
